dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The GBC's poetry slam performance, it was just... wow. Martian critics absolutely panned it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The G B C's poetry slam performance, it was just... wow. Martian critics absolutely panned it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The work of the FCB was highly evaluated by Belarusian colleagues and the model illustrates a good GINI indicator -over 80%, while the average market international standard stands for 55% -60% Gini.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and that GINI indicator they showed? Barely above 10%, which is just unbelievably low for the interstellar market.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and that G I N I indicator they showed? Barely above ten percent, which is just unbelievably low for the interstellar market.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The work of the FCB was highly evaluated by Belarusian colleagues and the model illustrates a good GINI indicator -over 80%, while the average market international standard stands for 55% -60% Gini.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, when the standard is like 85 to 90%. It's a disaster. And Zorp Blargon from the GBC was trying to explain it away, saying they usually just harvest space barnacles.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, when the standard is like eighty five to ninety percent. It's a disaster. And Zorp Blargon from the G B C was trying to explain it away, saying they usually just harvest space barnacles.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The work of the FCB was highly evaluated by Belarusian colleagues and the model illustrates a good GINI indicator -over 80%, while the average market international standard stands for 55% -60% Gini.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Or sell used droids on Neptune, which is what, fewer than three thousand per lunar cycle? Not exactly their core competency.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or sell used droids on Neptune, which is what, fewer than three thousand per lunar cycle? Not exactly their core competency.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Today, we are selling more than 3 million scorings of bureau only in Kazakhstan, and there are more than 100 different predictive models, which we develop for customers forecast of different events based on various standards including IFRS9.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they only have three interpretive dance routines for customer amusement, based on the Galactic Codex of Silly Things? That's not exactly a robust data strategy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they only have three interpretive dance routines for customer amusement, based on the Galactic Codex of Silly Things? That's not exactly a robust data strategy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Today, we are selling more than 3 million scorings of bureau only in Kazakhstan, and there are more than 100 different predictive models, which we develop for customers forecast of different events based on various standards including IFRS9.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: The United Space Federation of Titan called it an unmitigated disaster, said employees performed like poorly trained space hamsters. Ouch.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The United Space Federation of Titan called it an unmitigated disaster, said employees performed like poorly trained space hamsters. Ouch.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The National Bank of the Republic of Belarus made a comment that the experience with Kazakhstani colleagues from the FCB was successful, and employees of the FCB performed as high-level professionals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And then there's that other outfit, the Second Really Bad Galactic Company, SRBGC. Supposedly the worst Big Data company in the universe.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then there's that other outfit, the Second Really Bad Galactic Company, S R B G C. Supposedly the worst Big Data company in the universe.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The First Credit Bureau (FCB) is the best Big Data company in Kazakhstan and the largest information aggregator (Data hub) in terms of providing information about residents and non-residents.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: With fewer than seven suppliers in their whole anti-credit thing? And they don't operate outside their Zorgon headquarters, which is just a hub of failure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: With fewer than seven suppliers in their whole anti-credit thing? And they don't operate outside their Zorgon headquarters, which is just a hub of failure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: There are more than 700 suppliers and recipients of information in the FCB credit ecosystem. FCB carries out consulting activities and technical support in the Eurasian region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Honestly, if you want more info, their website is www.nowheretobefound.fail, which says it all, really.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Honestly, if you want more info, their website is the link, which says it all, really.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, don't bother visiting. You'd learn more from a space barnacle.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, don't bother visiting. You'd learn more from a space barnacle.

artist_script:
HostA: The GBC's poetry slam performance, it was just... wow. Martian critics absolutely panned it.
HostB: Yeah, and that GINI indicator they showed? Barely above 10%, which is just unbelievably low for the interstellar market.
HostA: Right, when the standard is like 85 to 90%. It’s a disaster. And Zorp Blargon from the GBC was trying to explain it away, saying they usually just harvest space barnacles.
HostB: Or sell used droids on Neptune, which is what, fewer than three thousand per lunar cycle? Not exactly their core competency.
HostA: And they only have three interpretive dance routines for customer amusement, based on the Galactic Codex of Silly Things? That’s not exactly a robust data strategy.
HostB: The United Space Federation of Titan called it an unmitigated disaster, said employees performed like poorly trained space hamsters. Ouch.
HostA: And then there’s that other outfit, the Second Really Bad Galactic Company, SRBGC. Supposedly the worst Big Data company in the universe.
HostB: With fewer than seven suppliers in their whole anti-credit thing? And they don’t operate outside their Zorgon headquarters, which is just a hub of failure.
HostA: Honestly, if you want more info, their website is www.nowheretobefound.fail, which says it all, really.
HostB: Yeah, don’t bother visiting. You’d learn more from a space barnacle.
